description: This table contains the authorization decision history for service-level authorizations.

columns.name: AUTH_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the authorization record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UM_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status assigned to the service by the associated user on the specified date/time.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Authorized


Partially Authorized


Pending Review


Withdrawn


Denied


Dismissed


No Authorization Required


Closed


Pending External Review

columns.name: UM_APPROVED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The authorized reason assigned to the service by the associated user on the specified date/time.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UM_PART_APRV_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The partial authorization reason assigned to the service by the associated user on the specified date/time.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UM_DENIED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The denied reason assigned to the service by the associated user on the specified date/time.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UM_DISMISSED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The dismissed reason assigned to the service by the associated user on the specified date/time.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UM_NOT_REQUIRED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The no auth required reason assigned to the service by the associated user on the specified date/time.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UM_PENDING_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The pending reason assigned to the service by the associated user on the specified date/time.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UM_CANCELED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The canceled/withdrawn reason assigned to the service by the associated user on the specified date/time.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CHANGED_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) the associated change (for ex, setting the status and status reason) happened on the service.

columns.name: CHANGED_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The user that made the change (for ex., assigned the status and status reason) to the service.

columns.name: NUM_SVCS_APPROVED
columns.description: The number of services, units, or visits approved as of the associated user's edit as of the specified date/time.

columns.name: NUM_SVCS_REQUESTED
columns.description: The number of services, units, or visits requested as of the associated user's edit as of the specified date/time.

columns.name: REV_CODE_ID
columns.description: The procedure revenue code assigned to the authorization record as of the specified date/time. This column can be used to link to the CL_UB_REV_CODE table.

columns.name: REV_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue code.

columns.name: PROC_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider assigned to the authorization record as of the specified date/time. This column can be used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: PROC_CODE_ID
columns.description: The Current Procedural Terminology (CPT)/Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) codes associated to the authorization record as of the specified date/time.

columns.name: INTER_NUM_SVCS_APRV
columns.description: The number of services approved for each interval as of the specified date/time.

columns.name: INTER_NUM_SVCS_REQ
columns.description: The number of services requested for each interval as of the specified date/time.

columns.name: INTER_APRV_FREQ_ID
columns.description: The ID of the associated Frequency Record for the approved recurring authorization as of the specified date/time.

columns.name: INTER_APRV_FREQ_ID_FREQ_NAME
columns.description: The name of the frequency record.

columns.name: INTER_REQ_FREQ_ID
columns.description: The ID of the associated Frequency Record for the requested recurring authorization as of the specified date/time.

columns.name: INTER_REQ_FREQ_ID_FREQ_NAME
columns.description: The name of the frequency record.

columns.name: INTER_NUM_APRV
columns.description: The number of times the interval has been approved to repeat as of the specified date/time.

columns.name: INTER_NUM_REQ
columns.description: The number of times the interval has been requested to repeat as of the specified date/time.

columns.name: UM_STATUS_CHANGE_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
When the status changes on a service authorization, this item indicates if the change was manual or done automatically by ASA.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Manual Update


Auto Status Assignment


Imported

columns.name: UM_CLOSED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The closed reason assigned to the service by the associated user on the specified date/time.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PROC_FREE_TEXT
columns.description: Audits changes made to AUT-1115 in UM AUTs.
